price: Mereka berkata, "Aduh celakalah kami! Siapakah yang membangkitkan kami dari tempat-tidur kami (kubur)?" Inilah yang dijanjikan (Tuhan) Yang Maha Pemurah dan benarlah rasul-rasul-(Nya).
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرۡقَدِنَاۜۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāwaylanā man baʿathanā min marqadinā hādhā mā waʿada al-raḥmānu waṣadaqa al-mur'salūna
